longBusinessSummary: Electric Metals (USA) Limited engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the United States, Canada, and Australia. It primarily explores for silver, gold, and manganese deposits. The company holds a 100% ownership interest in the Corcoran Canyon Silver project comprising 328 contiguous and unpatented mineral claims covering an area of approximately 2,674 hectares located in the Nye County, Nevada; and holds a 100% ownership interest in the Belmont Silver project that consists of 124 unpatented mineral claims covering an area of approximately 1,034.6 hectares located in the Nye County, Nevada. It also holds a 100% ownership interest in the Emily Manganese project located in Minnesota, the United States. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
